podcastsoff2.replace: $1 for (let i=0; i<(e.children?e.children.length:e.length); i++) {const key=(e.children?.[i]||e[i])?.key; if(!key||key.match(/(episode|show)/)||(e.title||t)?.match(/podcasts/i)) return null;};
